entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
